categories: Category:Articles with an excess of redlinks
Category:Star Wars: Age of Rebellion adventures

nodes.text: Dead in the Water is an adventure in Fantasy Flight Games' Star Wars: Age of Rebellion series. It is included in the Game Master's Kit, released on July 3, 2014.

What begins as a routine cargo run takes a drastic turn for the worse, and player characters will eventually find themselves fighting for their lives, as their ship careens out of control and into the whirling suction of a black hole.

Player characters must contend with overwhelming odds, and some surprising obstacles if they wish to survive–and make it back to the Alliance, cargo in tow. Dead in the Water provides a thrilling, death-defying adventure for both new players, and experienced roleplayers alike.

A team of Rebel Alliance operatives has been assigned to the frigate Shadow Raptor in order to take possession of a group of droids, which were actually programmed by the Galactic Empire. They take over the ship, which becomes disabled and trapped by a black hole. Captain Hylo Sortuli orders the team to prevent vital intelligence from getting captured. They escape the ship and return to Port Tooga to uncover the Imperial Intelligence plot.
